desc: This machine can reorganize pixels into almost any shape.
name: ^orange;Pixel Printer^white;

desc: Embers dance away from the campfire, warming the air. The heat can be used for cooking.
name: ^orange;Campfire^white;

desc: Used to produce capture pods, healing stations and other pet related items.
name: ^orange;Pet Station^white;

desc: Used to make fossil excavation tools and display cases.
name: ^orange;Fossil Station^white;

desc: Can be used to produce armour and weapons.
name: ^orange;Iron Anvil^white;

desc: One could build some very sophisticated equipment on this table.
name: ^orange;Iron Crafting Table^white;

desc: The creature healing station is used to heal captured creatures.
name: ^orange;Pet Healing Station^white;

desc: Compress pixels for storage.
name: ^orange;Pixel Compressor^white;

desc: Used to produce rails, rail riding items and related objects.
name: ^orange;Rail Crafting Table^white;

desc: The refinery is used to produce raw pixels from ores.
name: ^orange;Refinery^white;

desc: The anvil is used to produce armour and weapons from fabric and ores.
name: ^orange;Anvil^white;

desc: A module that adds additional ranged equipment and armour to the replicator.
name: ^orange;Accelerator Addon^white;

desc: A module that adds additional high-tech combat equipment and armour to the replicator.
name: ^orange;Manipulator Addon^white;

desc: A module that adds additional melee equipment and armour to the replicator.
name: ^orange;Separator Addon^white;

desc: Used to produce items for hunting, mining and farming.
name: ^orange;Foraging Table^white;

desc: Used to turn ores and other materials into crafting ingredients.
name: ^orange;Primitive Furnace^white;

desc: Can be used to produce materials and objects needed to build a settlement.
name: ^orange;Wooden Workbench^white;

desc: The apothecary is used to produce healing items and medicine.
name: ^orange;Apothecary^white;

desc: The spinning wheel is used to produce clothing, fabrics and other crafting ingredients.
name: ^orange;Spinning Wheel^white;

desc: The inventor's table is used to produce various crafting stations.
name: ^orange;Inventor's Table^white;

desc: Used to produce complex wiring components.
name: ^orange;Wiring Station^white;

desc: Used to produce wholesome foods with a variety of effects.
name: ^orange;Kitchen Counter^white;
